params._unlock_time: Unlock time for new Lock. If locks already exists, this parameter is ignored.
params.swapData: Odos swap data to swap assets to WETH.

acceptOwnership().details: The new owner accepts the ownership transfer.

params._odosRouter: The address of the OdosRouterV2 contract.
params._token: The address of the ERC20 token to be used for locking.
params._votingEscrow: The address of the VotingEscrow contract.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

pendingOwner().details: Returns the address of the pending owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params._vault: The address of the new Balancer vault.

params._newAddress: The address of the new IMO Token.

transferOwnership(address).details: Starts the ownership transfer of the contract to a new account. Replaces the pending transfer if there is one. Can only be called by the current owner.

params._amount: The amount of tokens to lock.
params._unlock_time: The timestamp at which the lock will expire.

params._amount: The amount of tokens to add to the existing lock.

params._unlock_time: Unlock time for new Lock. If locks already exists, this parameter is ignored.
params.swapData: Odos swap data to swap assets to WETH.

AutoCompoundRewards(bytes,uint256,addres.notice: Autocompound Rewards assets to WETH, add to BPT and stake to Aura and Voting Escrow. Requires _RewardsToken Approval approval from user

constructor.notice: Initializes the Zapper contract with the specified token and VotingEscrow contract addresses.

removeBalancerAllowance().notice: Removes WETH allowance for the specified Balancer vault.

resetBalancerAllowance().notice: Resets WETH allowance for the specified Balancer vault.

setBalancerPoolId(bytes32).notice: Sets a new pool ID for Balancer operations.

setBalancerVault(address).notice: Sets a new address for the Balancer vault.

setImoAddress(address).notice: Sets a new address for the IMO address.

zapAndCreateLockFor(uint256,uint256,addr.notice: Transfers tokens from the user and creates a new lock in the VotingEscrow contract.

zapAndDepositForLock(uint256,address).notice: Transfers tokens from the user and adds them to an existing lock in the VotingEscrow contract.

zapAssetsToWethAndStake(bytes,uint256,ad.notice: Zap Odos assets to WETH, add to BPT and stake to Aura and Voting Escrow. Requires WETH approval from user
